articles.title: Marijuana linked with heart failure, heart attack: New studies - USA TODAY
articles.description: Two studies shared by the American Heart Association found that marijuana use may impact cardiovascular health in a similar way to tobacco.
articles.content:
Two new studies exploring the long-term effects of marijuana have found a possible link between use of the drug and one's risk for major health events like heart failure and heart attack.
